A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good movie\, entertaining\, nice to get more of the Star Wars story\, but in the end\, it was an underwhelming experience.  Too much forced humor\, which was very out of the character of the other movies in the series.  It also felt very choppy\, like they were trying to fit so much story into the time-frame of 2.5 hours....so much that it felt thin and rushed.
